title: A nice Q
content: I'm looking for a typeface with a nice lowercase "q". Thoughts anyone?
author: wrayco

comments.content:
Some people like the "Q"s that Luc[as] de Groot makes. The original Caslon Italic has a killer "Q". I like "Q"s where the tail cuts in -and removes- part of the body, like the Italic one here: [http://www.themicrofoundry.com/other/Emerson.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023194652/http:/www.themicrofoundry.com/other/Emerson.gif "http://www.themicrofoundry.com/other/Emerson.gif")

BTW, if you can get a hold of Rookledge's "Typefinder",  
it has a section towards the end that shows hundreds of  
different variants of each letter, indexed to the fonts.

hhp
Something tells me this is for a logo. Perhaps you might talk more about what the usage is and the nature of the client.

Hrant, note that the original request is for a _lowercase_ q.

I designed a nice one last week, but I'm not allowed to show it to anyone yet. :)

Oh, sorry! I guess the thread title threw me off.

Adobe Reliq has a cool "q". So does Eidetic's italic:  
 [http://www.emigre.com/dp/getfontpage.php?PEidIt.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023194652/http:/www.emigre.com/dp/getfontpage.php?PEidIt.html "http://www.emigre.com/dp/getfontpage.php?PEidIt.html") \_  
And I think my Cristaal's "q" is kinda nice.

hhp

Th. Kunz  
[www.pomeranz.de]

kofi by fontfarm.de has a nice lowercase q that looks like an uppercase

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023194652im_/http:/typophile.com/files/kofi-sampler.gif)

[http://fontfarm.de/themes/fonts/kofi/index.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023194652/http:/fontfarm.de/themes/fonts/kofi/index.php "http://fontfarm.de/themes/fonts/kofi/index.php")

Gill Sans, surely?  
This is nice:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023194652im_/http:/typophile.com/files/quanto.JPG)

where is this scan from!?  
It's really a nice q!
It's an alternative in Griffo's 1503 italic. The shape of the bowl is closer to that of ordinary q than that of Q.
